entities.name: Junteng Liu
observations: Ph.D. candidate, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), NLP Group (2024–present)
B.Eng., Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), 2020–2024, graduated June 2024
Research areas: Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning
Research interests: LLM reasoning, reinforcement learning, hallucination in vision-language models, truthfulness and interpretability of LLMs
Research Intern, Tencent WXG (June 2024–September 2024), advised by Zifei Shan
Research Intern, Shanghai AI Lab (June 2023–December 2023), advised by Prof. Yu Cheng

First author: 'SynLogic: Synthesizing Verifiable Reasoning Data at Scale for Learning Logical Reasoning and Beyond' (2025, arXiv) — co-authors: Yuanxiang Fan; Zhuo Jiang; Han Ding; Yongyi Hu; Chi Zhang; Yiqi Shi; Shitong Weng; Aili Chen; Shiqi Chen; Yunan Huang; Mozhi Zhang; Pengyu Zhao; Junjie Yan; Junxian He
First author: 'On the Perception Bottleneck of VLMs for Chart Understanding' (2025, arXiv) — co-authors: Weihao Zeng; Xiwen Zhang; Yijun Wang; Zifei Shan; Junxian He
First author: 'On the Universal Truthfulness Hyperplane Inside LLMs' (2024, EMNLP) — co-authors: Shiqi Chen; Yu Cheng; Junxian He

Co-author: 'In-Context Sharpness as Alerts: An Inner Representation Perspective for Hallucination Mitigation' (2024, ICML) — authors: Shiqi Chen; Miao Xiong; Junteng Liu; Zhengxuan Wu; Teng Xiao; Siyang Gao; Junxian He

Co-author: 'C-Eval: A Multi-Level Multi-Discipline Chinese Evaluation Suite for Foundation Models' (2023, NeurIPS) — authors: Yuzhen Huang; Yuzhuo Bai; Zhihao Zhu; Junlei Zhang; Jinghan Zhang; Tangjun Su; Junteng Liu; Chuancheng Lv; Yikai Zhang; Jiayi Lei; Yao Fu; Maosong Sun; Junxian He
Co-author: 'Composing Parameter-Efficient Modules with Arithmetic Operations' (2023, NeurIPS) — authors: Jinghan Zhang; Shiqi Chen; Junteng Liu; Junxian He

dedup_notes: Merged duplicate person entries and deduplicated repeated observations about education, research interests, internships, publications, awards, and contact info.

Kept the more specific education entry 'B.Eng., Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), 2020–2024, graduated June 2024' over the shorter 'Graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) in June 2024'.

For internships, preserved date ranges and advisor names when available and removed shorter duplicate statements (e.g., 'Research Intern at MINIMAX (February 2025 - Present)' normalized to 'Research Intern, MINIMAX (February 2025–present)').

Publications were consolidated by title; when venue/date was present in one variant and not another, the more specific variant was retained (e.g., 'On the Universal Truthfulness Hyperplane Inside LLMs' kept with EMNLP 2024).
Contact information consolidated into canonical URL and handle formats; email kept as provided.
No facts were invented; all retained details are present in the original memory.json. Conflicting shorter variants were removed in favor of more detailed originals; removed variants are listed above.
